page.title: 08FOOD
page.content: A survey of favourite family meals amongst junior school pupils revealed an equal split twixt those who preferred traditional cuisine and those who liked to experiment with foreign fare. Andrew,aged 11,has a favourite lunch of roast beef,Yorkshire pud,roast potatoes,carrots,string beans & gravy.Both fresh & frozen vegetables are used & pressure cooking is employed. A less traditional menu which emerged was Stir Fry Vegetables with Prawns,the ingredients being mushrooms,cabbage,beansprouts,green & red peppers,carrot,onion,green beans, frozen prawns,cooking oil and soya sauce.These were cooked in a traditional Chinese manner.
